import HomepageHeading from '../HomePageHeading/HomepageHeading'; import getWidth from '../ContainerWidth/GetWidth' import React, { Component, useState } from 'react' import { Button, Container, Menu, Responsive, Segment, Visibility, Grid, Divider, Image, Header, Search } from 'semantic-ui-react' import HeaderPart from '../../../HeaderSegement/HeaderPart'; import got from '../../../Images/got.png'; import ghost from '../../../Images/ghost.png'; import '../../../NewOne/Appp.css'; import vk from '../../../Images/vk.png'; import narcos from '../../../Images/narcos.png'; import MovieInfo from '../../../HeaderSegement/Explore/MovieInfo' import { getQueriesForElement } from '@testing-library/react'; import ImageOfRolePlayers from '../../../HeaderSegement/Explore/ImageOfRolePlayers'; const DesktopContainer = ({ children }) => { const [fixedMenu, setFixedMenu] = useState(false); const FixedMenu = () => { setFixedMenu(!fixedMenu) } const [WidthResponsive, setWidthResponsive] = useState(); return ( FixedMenu()} onBottomPassedReverse={() => FixedMenu()}> {/* */} {/* Home Work Company */} Reports Analytics Export Nav item Nav item again One more nav Another nav item More navigation
Narcos

{/* */} A gritty chronicle of the war against Colombia's infamously violent and powerful drug cartels. {/* */} {/* */} {/* */} {/* {children} */} ) } export default DesktopContainer;
